name: Foodme
body:
# Welcome to foodme
When it comes to your night out, you shouldn't have to do any thinking. That's where foodme comes in. We want to take the hassle out of choosing where to eat. foodme intelligently decides where you should eat and tells you everything you need to know to get there!

We'll get to know you and your eating habits and we will recommend a restaurant for you through machine learning! We utilize the yelp api and google maps api to bring your information to you, but developed our own algorithm for determining where you want to go next! The model is simple and clutter free, we want to to tell what you want to know and nothing more. Possible Facebook integration to come soon.

## About us
We are a group of college students who want to take the Hackathon scene by storm. We made our debut in high school and have kept in touch through college. You can check out more of our projects [here](https://github.com/TheWashingtonRedskins).


## Authors and Contributors
This project is a subset of the greater organization the Washington Redskins â„¢ . The collaborators on this project were Jake Saferstein (@TheSafo) ,  James Lennon (@jameslennon321), David Woldenberg ( @dwoldenberg1), and Marko Fejzo. Jake and James primarily worked the ios development. David and Marko also did ios development, but primarily developed the algorithm for the application. David also worked on this website.

### Support or Contact
Have any questions about the app or our organization? Send us an email at thewashingredskins.hacking@gmail.com .
